page.title: 12FESTIVALS
page.content: There are lots of local festivals and customs in Marston and Hougham. One of the best festivals is the summer fete which is held every year at the village hall. There are lots of colourful and bright stalls inside and outside. The games and less serious stalls are set up outside and inside there is flower arranging, art competitions and cake stalls. There is also a village junior marching band which is called The Bulebirds organised by Mrs. Jill Turner. They perform at the fete and other events. Occasionally the church is used for a wedding. When this happens there is always lots of people attending.
